name: Suzuka Nakamoto
description: {{nihongo|'''Suzuka Nakamoto'''|中元 すず香|Nakamoto Suzuka|{{Audio|Suzuka-Nakamoto.ogg|pronunciation}}; born December 20, 1997|lead=yes}}, better known by her [[stage name]] '''Su-metal''', is a Japanese singer and songwriter. She is best known as a member of the [[kawaii metal]] band [[Babymetal]] and was formerly a member of the [[Japanese idol|idol]] groups [[Karen Girl's]] and [[Sakura Gakuin]]. She is represented by the talent agency [[Amuse Inc.]]
